settings.leftheading: Vet Reveals Her Biggest Secret For Keeping Cats Calm and Stress-Free Throughout Their Lives!
settings.text:
Dear cat parent,


My name is Ciara Braun and I’ve been a Veterinary and Cat Behaviorist for over 15 years.


In that time, I’ve seen cats of all shapes, sizes, and breeds come through my doors.


And despite the fact every cat is different, their tranquility, happiness and everyday behavior is all influenced by:


Unmanaged stress and anxiety.


Now, please don’t disregard this issue as an ‘outdoor cat’s problem’ because it’s not. In fact, studies have shown cats as young as one-year-old can show signs of stress and anxiety.


To put that into perspective, the average cat lives to about 12 years old, which is only 4383 days…


…some even less depending on the breed…


…and if your cat’s stress issues start when they are just one year old…


…that means they only get to enjoy those first 365 days of their life fully.


The rest of their lives might be spent dealing with the discomfort and limitations of unmanaged stress and anxiety...

settings.leftheading: Cat anxiety and chronic stress are common but NOT normal…
settings.text:
And the painful reality is an overwhelming majority of cats experience stress and anxiety most of the time…


Unfortunately, their parents are clueless about what signs to look out for and so they either don’t act fast enough…


…or don’t act at all until they bring their cat through my doors.


It breaks my heart every time I tell a loving parent their cat's quality of life is compromised...


Because every owner thinks their feline friend is just being quirky...


…only to learn their cat's behavior is a symptom of deeper stress.


I’ll cover HOW to take care of chronic stress and anxiety in a moment…


However…

settings.leftheading: You MUST know what signs to look out for in your cat
settings.text:
These are:

  • Hiding more often
  • Over-grooming leading to bald spots
  • Peeing outside the litter box
  • Unusual aggression
  • Excessive meowing
  • Loss of appetite or overeating


Just imagine if you were in their position. How anxious and helpless would you feel in life if you had to live with constant stress and anxiety?


Now, if your cat is not showing any of the above signs…


Does this mean you should wait until they do before you act?


Absolutely NOT!


Acting before you see any signs is critical and if your cat is currently calm and content, with no signs of stress...


The best way to maintain their tranquility and help them live a long, happy life with you is to sustain the current peace in their environment.


So, now you know the signs to look out for in your cat…


And you know the importance of acting fast…


…even if you see no signs at all…

settings.leftheading: Here is what every cat needs to combat stress and anxiety.
settings.text:
Just one important thing:


Once you find out what these are and what they can do, you’ll be tempted to grab them from your nearest store or online. However…


STOP!


This will do nothing but burn a hole in your pocket. I’ll explain exactly why that is later. First, let’s cover what they are:


Pheromone Diffusers.


Now you're probably wondering, 'What on earth is a pheromone diffuser?' 


Well, let's just say it's the secret weapon many cat parents are yet to discover.


Simply put, it's a device that speaks your cat's language, offering them comfort in a dialect they understand instinctively by releasing calming feline pheromones into the air.


These are the very same scents cats naturally produce and associate with safety and familiarity. 


Stick with me here, because next, we're going to take a fascinating journey into the world of Pheromones and why they're essential:

settings.leftheading: #1 Feline Facial Pheromones - The Invisible Peacekeepers
settings.text:
Picture this - your cat nuzzles its face against a corner, furniture, or perhaps your leg.


Cute, right? But it's more than that. They are depositing pheromones, chemical messengers unique to cats, invisible yet influential.


These pheromones promote a sense of safety and familiarity. They're invisible yet powerful notes marking, "I've been here; this is safe."


These naturally occurring substances don't just ease tension and stress, they also play a crucial role in addressing common issues.


Whether it's deterring your cat from spraying, reducing excessive scratching, or tempering aggressive behavior, these pheromones work like invisible peacekeepers in your home.

settings.leftheading: #2 Maternal Appeasing Pheromones - Mothers Soothing Symphony
settings.text:
Let's rewind to a simpler time when your cat was just a tiny kitten, cocooned in the warmth and safety of its mother. 


Remember that sense of comfort and peace? It wasn't by accident. It's all down to something very special - Maternal Appeasing Pheromones.


Now, these aren't your everyday pheromones. They're a special kind of love letter from mama cat to her kittens, delivering a silent but potent message: "You're safe. You're home."


As kittens grow and the world gets bigger and scarier, stress creeps in, and they can long for that feeling of security again. This is where Maternal Appeasing Pheromones come into play!


By imitating the mother's soothing signals, these pheromones can reproduce that sense of security and familiarity that cats desire...


But they're also key in tackling unwanted behaviors. From uncharacteristic aggression to excessive meowing and restlessness, these pheromones can act as a remedy, reducing these behaviors and instilling a sense of calm.

settings.leftheading: A Word of Caution Against Grabbing Any Old Diffuser Off The Shelf!
settings.text:
Sadly, too many diffusers on the market are cheap knock-offs or, even worse, entirely ineffective. 


Buying any random pheromone diffusers? Not a wise choice.


Why? Many brands resort to poor sourcing or synthetic versions of these vital pheromones, barely delivering the comfort your cat needs…


What's more, most products include ONLY one type of pheromone. This shortcut often fails to fully combat stress and unwanted behaviors!


When you combine poor sourcing with a one-dimensional approach...


It's no wonder so many cat owners find themselves frustrated and disappointed with the lack of results.


So, if you're considering a pheromone diffuser for your feline friend...


And I highly recommend you do…

The TheraPet team takes a journey of discovery to select the most potent and effective pheromones from across the globe, brought directly to their cutting-edge FDA-registered facility.


Here's where the magic happens...


Their Unique Dual-Pheromone Formulation


Where other brands barely scratch the surface with single, often less effective pheromones…


TheraPet raises the bar.


TheraPet's distinctive formulation combines Facial and Maternal Appeasing Pheromones, creating a synergy that maximizes stress relief and tranquility.


This combination – a first of its kind – is what sets TheraPet apart. 


The result? A comprehensive solution to feline stress, all contained within one inconspicuous and user-friendly diffuser…

settings.leftheading: Your cat will thank you after just weeks of using TheraPet!
settings.text:
A diffuser that can soothe your cat's stress and anxiety, fostering serenity well into their golden years...


So they can have the peace to play, relax, and enjoy life just like they were kittens again.


So, if you want the best for your cat...


Then give them the best...


Because they deserve it.


And if you want the best solution for relieving your cat’s stress and anxiety…


And putting an end to unwanted behaviors like peeing everywhere, scratching, hiding…

It’s the ONLY solution.


Don’t just take my word for it...


Check out what other cat parents like you have to say about TheraPet Diffuser…

With raving reviews like these…
